title: The true historie of the Christen departynge of the reuere[n]de ma[n] D. Martyne Luther, collected by Iustus Ionas, Michael Celius, and Ioannes Aurifaber whych were present therat, & translated into Englysh by Iohan Bale
author: Jonas, Justus, 1493-1555.
notes: Wrongly dated 1566 on Cv; correct date on C6r--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
